comment: I took this professor's playwriting class because I love to write. I've taken several writing courses, and feedback is a must in any of them. In this class, however, none of our assignments were graded in a timely fashion, the teacher hardly responded to emails, and she did not give any feedback on our writing, which is a shame for serious writers.

This could have been a great class but Professor Fulton was ABSENT well into past the mid-term. She was HORRIBLE returning emails. No one really knew how they were doing in this class (no grades) with just barely 3 weeks left in the semester, it was VERY BAD. We (students) self taught ourselves. Probably one of the most STRESSFUL classes for me.

I took this is an asynchronous online course because of COVID. I was excited to take it because of Professor Fulton's experience. However, she does not post grades, respond to emails, or provide feedback on assignments. I've had to fly blindly through this entire semester. I would not recommend taking this if you value feedback and advice w/writing

Took her forever to grade my stuff and communicate. Felt like she didn't like me and forgot to open one of the assignments (very stressful esp since nobody could get ahold of her, which made sense because we were on break). Overall, the course was enjoyable so I'd bit the bullet and take it with her again. I've had worse.

Take her if you want a prof. with experience in the industry. I believe Prof. Fulton helped me flourish a ton in my writing, and I also feel she has helped me find my when it comes to my professional life. Go talk to her outside of class! You won't regret it because she is very helpful and full of great ideas to help your career take flight.

Professor Fulton is one of the best professors I've had in 4 years of college. She's a great teacher, she makes the class super fun, and most importantly, she does an amazing job with conducting the class in a manner that helps you develop relationships with your classmates. Take her, but don't be lazy! She expects her students to work for it.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Inspirational--GRADED BY FEW THINGS

comment: If you would like to gain understanding and experience in screenwriting, professor Fulton- Ponder is the best professor to take. She is active in film and television presently, so she is up to date on the industry and the constantly evolving infrastructure. You will have an opportunity to write a television series with your peers! So fun!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--GROUP PROJECTS

comment: I am a senior now, and out of all the teachers Ive encountered, Prof. Fulton is one of the best professors. She really cares about all of her students success in and out of the class. I ended up with an A and a great script.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Skip class? You won't pass.--Inspirational

comment: I would never recommend this professor to ANYONE. She is rude, unreasonable and will not help you at all. It is November and I still do not have a single grade online or on paper. She does not post anything online and her syllabus is extremely hard to follow. In speaking with other classmates, no one knows what is going on. It's a no from me.
